channel.title: CVE Feed for Openfind -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Openfind -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6048|2024-06-17T07:28:48.935Z -- openfind -- mailgates%205.0
item.description: Openfind's MailGates and MailAudit fail to properly filter user input when analyzing email attachments. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject system commands and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5399|2024-06-10T17:37:56.728Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v7.0
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 does not properly filter parameters of specific API. Remote attackers with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5400|2024-06-04T18:02:31.562Z -- openfind -- mail2000%20v8.0
item.description: Openfind Mail2000 does not properly filter parameters of specific CGI. Remote attackers with regular privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the remote server.
